Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12133 affecting package libtasn1 for versions less than 4.19.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12133 affecting package libtasn1 for versions less than 4.19.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtasn1 is earlier than 4.19.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-12133
